feed.title: The Magnetizer Example Site - Somewhere to Start

entry.title: The simple website generator - The Magnetizer Example Site
entry.summary: Magnetizer allows you to quickly and easily generate static websites using Markdown and customisable templates. Some features include: An index view showing short versions of your posts. And you decide how short! Separate article page for each article, showing the article in all its glory. Display aâ€¦

entry.title: For Magnus, by Magnus - The Magnetizer Example Site
entry.summary: I created Magnetizer to cater for my own website needs. It does what I need it to do and nothing else. It probably doesn't do what you want it to do, but that's fine. Photo by Squared.one on Unsplash
